div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 30th June 1878.

cell.p:
150
225 deleted. Each of the items in these two columns ,
I assume that the note applies to the two "estimates" columns. But it is ambiguous and needs to be checked. If my reading is correct, I think it would be better to move this note to the top of the previous estimate approved column and make it read " each of the items in this and the estimate of expenditure for the quarter column, except those that have been amended, has been ticked.' Or a similar note.

cell.p:
Total — Four hundred and twenty seven pounds ten shillings
and pen
